{{Actor| | type = Token | name = You've killed The Loremaster | class = QuestItem26 | game = Strife | convid = 337 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:QuestItem|QuestItem]]→QuestItem26
''Quest Flag 26 - Killed the [[Classes:AlienSpectre5|Loremaster]]. Doing this also gives the player a Stamina Upgrade and an Accuracy Upgrade. Also opens strange unofficially secret areas in many maps that appear to be designed for use in multiplayer.'' ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR QuestItem26 : {{Class|QuestItem}} {}
